data.name: 0000 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina—Mind if we talk…?

data.name: 0001 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hm? What is it?

data.name: 0002 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Could I borrow you as well, Nagato?

data.name: 0005 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't think keeping lookout outside the music room is a good use of our time.

data.name: 0006 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But Suzumiya told us to…

data.name: 0007 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well that's Haruhi.

data.name: 0008 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's reconsider our situation.

data.name: 0009 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We heard about being able to hear piano from a music room that should've been empty.

data.name: 0010 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That clubmember wasn't acting normally, right?

data.name: 0011 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You're right—it was kind of scary.

data.name: 0012 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not to mention, the long-hared girl I saw.

data.name: 0013 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No matter how I think about it, I can't imagine how that could've been anything else.

data.name: 0014 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's impossible for normal humans to erase themselves from regular space.

data.name: 0015 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right?

data.name: 0016 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wouldn't say it was the ghost of some beautiful pianist girl either.

data.name: 0017 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But then—I'm not sure what I'd say it was… It's strange.

data.name: 0018 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right—it's the sort of thing we can't show Haruhi under any circumstance.

data.name: 0019 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That "Man-Eating Classroom" was the same.

data.name: 0020 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think something's going on in this school.

data.name: 0021 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that's right. I have the same opinion.

data.name: 0022 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then, what's our top priority of things we need to get done?

data.name: 0023 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh? Our top priority of things to we need to get done?

data.name: 0024 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Can we really afford to just wait here and keep lookout like Haruhi asked?

data.name: 0025 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There are better things we could be doing than confirming this weird phenomenon, right?

data.name: 0026 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's… Hmm…

data.name: 0027 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We should be focusing on making sure Haruhi doesn't see that stupid phenomenon.

data.name: 0028 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, I see. That's right.

data.name: 0029 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we can put an end to this ridiculous summer camp as soon as possible…

data.name: 0030 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …and get Haruhi out of the school, we deal with this stupid phenomenon later.

data.name: 0031 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's certainly exactly as you say, however…

data.name: 0032 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think we should try to convince Haruhi to end the summer camp.

data.name: 0033 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Will you help me? Asahina? Nagato?

data.name: 0035 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: My role is to observe Haruhi Suzumiya.

data.name: 0036 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah, right.

data.name: 0037 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato mentioned before that her objective is only to observe Haruhi…

data.name: 0038 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …and that she wants to refrain from any direct interference.

data.name: 0039 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guess there's no helping it then.

data.name: 0040 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I guess persuasion isn't exactly your strong point anyway.

data.name: 0041 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No worries, Nagato.

data.name: 0042 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina and I will do something about it by ourselves.

data.name: 0043 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon! Umm, I'm sorry—!

data.name: 0044 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I can't help you either.

data.name: 0045 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-you too, Asahina?

data.name: 0046 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Any active interference beyond what's necessary…

data.name: 0047 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …can have an unforseen consequence on the future.

data.name: 0048 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If there's an emergency, I should be contacted about it.

data.name: 0049 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But if it's Suzuimya's will…

data.name: 0050 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …I can't take any action on my own.

data.name: 0051 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm truly sorry, Kyon!

data.name: 0052 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, it's fine. I asked for something unreasonable.

data.name: 0053 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Being rejected any cooperation is quite a shock, but…

data.name: 0054 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …neither of them can do so in their positions.

data.name: 0055 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I just hope they respect I've got a position of my own that I need to fulfill.

data.name: 0056 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, don't worry about persuading Haruhi—you can keep your role.

data.name: 0057 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But in the same way—you won't get in my way, right?

data.name: 0058 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0059 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: More specifically, will you help me?

data.name: 0061 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …If it's within my permitted limit.

data.name: 0062 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see. That's helps. I'm relying on you.

data.name: 0064 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I understand the position you're in.

data.name: 0065 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sorry for asking unreasonably earlier.

data.name: 0066 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: No at all, it's not like that.

data.name: 0067 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not gonna ask you to convince Haruhi.

data.name: 0068 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But, will you help me with what I'm doing?

data.name: 0069 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I don't know if there's anything I can do to help…

data.name: 0070 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But as long as it has nothing to do with <classified information> I'll do what I can.

data.name: 0071 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm really glad to hear it.

data.name: 0072 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I have Asahina with me, I feel like I could get through anything.

data.name: 0073 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Do have a plan, Kyon?

data.name: 0074 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's the problem.

data.name: 0075 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't have any good ideas. I have no idea what we should do…

data.name: 0076 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …What's that? The sound of a music box?

data.name: 0077 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think I can hear it coming from over there. Let's go.

data.name: 0078 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There was a music box on the floor over here?

data.name: 0079 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There is no record of its existence from prior to the end-of-term ceremony.

data.name: 0080 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words—it was placed here recently, right?

data.name: 0081 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I don't know how to explain it, but it's a wonderful melody~

data.name: 0082 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I feel like I want to listen to it forever…

data.name: 0083 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: An empty music room… The sound of a piano…

data.name: 0084 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Maybe they just heard this and mistook it?

data.name: 0085 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait a second, the truth isn't important here.

data.name: 0086 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's say this was playing inside the music room.

data.name: 0087 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see—

data.name: 0088 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We might be able to convince Suzumiya with that, right?

data.name: 0089 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, let's carry this to the music room before Haruhi gets here.

data.name: 0090 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Heave-ho…

data.name: 0091 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha—?!

data.name: 0092 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Nagato?!

data.name: 0093 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato broke the music box as I was trying to pick it up.

data.name: 0094 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why'd you do that, Nagato?

data.name: 0095 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Was she that upset about me trying to interfere with Haruhi?

data.name: 0096 (397.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If she just told me so, I would've happily reconsidered…

data.name: 0097 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Listening to that music box for too long is dangerous.

data.name: 0098 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …What?

data.name: 0099 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The sound has the effect of forcibly instal- ling a behavior program onto human brains.

data.name: 0100 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that Computer Society member!

data.name: 0101 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Perhaps he was being controlled by this music box…?

data.name: 0102 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Seems like it wasn't far off to assume that this music box had…

data.name: 0103 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …something to do with the truth behind the case.

data.name: 0104 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What should we do about this music box?

data.name: 0105 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It would be dangerous to leave it here, even if it's broken…

data.name: 0106 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's keep hold of it.

data.name: 0107 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It may be broken, but we don't know what other dangers there might be.

data.name: 0108 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's not touch it and just leave it alone for the time being.

data.name: 0109 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It might be dangerous if someone touches it, right?

data.name: 0110 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Shall we stick on a piece of paper with "Danger: Do not touch" written on it?

data.name: 0111 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Wait, hold on.

data.name: 0112 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If someone like Haruhi sees that, it'd only make them want to touch it more.

data.name: 0113 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I get the same feeling. It's tricky…

data.name: 0114 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess we should hold off on the memo idea then.

data.name: 0115 (397.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There is a subject that planted this music box.

data.name: 0116 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato's right—The culprit must be around somewhere.

data.name: 0117 (397.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I wonder if the music room is suspicious after all…?

data.name: 0118 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's call Koizumi before we barge into the music room.

data.name: 0119 (397.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: He's a shady guy, but he's certainly reliable in times like these.

data.name: 0120 (397.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Check with Nagato

data.name: 0121 (397.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Check with Mikuru

data.name: 0122 (397.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Collect the music box

data.name: 0123 (397.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Leave the music box
